import classes from './MealItem.module.css' import React,{useContext} from 'react' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import CartContext from '../../../Store/cart-contetx' const MealItem = (props) => { const catrtCtx=useContext(CartContext) const price=`$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` //*get price upto 2 dec places const addToCartHandler=(amt)=>{ catrtCtx.add } return (

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • ) } export default MealItem
